about_the_game:
Be part of ESEAL, an elite force tasked with a mission of utmost secrecy and peril. In our cooperative FPS horror tactical game, you and your team are deployed to a remote base that harbors dark secrets. A catastrophic mistake has transformed the personnel into horrific abominations, reminiscent of creatures from nightmares, with unknown entities. Your objective is to clean up all traces of this disaster, gather crucial information, and follow all the orders of your higher ups or suffer the consequences.

Key Features:

  • Cooperative Gameplay: Team up with friends or players worldwide in intense co-op missions where coordination and strategy are key.

  • Tactical Combat: Utilize a variety of weapons and tools to navigate through dangerous environments and eliminate mutated threats.

  • Atmospheric Horror: Experience a gripping atmosphere with chilling visuals and sound design that will keep you on edge.

  • Deep Lore: Uncover the sinister backstory of the ESEAL force, who they are, what they stand for and the company’s true backstory.

  • Dynamic Environments: Engage in missions within complex, interactive environments where every decision matters.

  • Highly Customizable Arsenal: Fine-tune your weapon to perfection by not only swapping attachments but also adjusting their precise position on the rail, and change weapon parts entirely to optimize everything from horizontal and vertical recoil control to weapon sway and stability.

Prepare for a heart-pounding experience as you face the unknown and make tough choices to ensure the secrecy of your operations.

Facility Sectors

  • Sector 1: Research and Lab Sector

  • Sector 2: Mining Operation and Machinery Sector

  • Sector 3: Living Quarters Sector

  • Sector 4: Weapons Sector

  • Sector 5: Reactor and Energy Sector

Incident Report: Anomalous Entities

Overview:

As of ████/██/██, seven distinct extremely dangerous entities have been identified within the compromised facility. Each entity exhibits unique behavior patterns and appears to exert control over specific sections of the base. The origins of these entities remain unknown, and their existence defies current scientific understanding. We are also expecting the existence of more entities that have not yet been discovered. All information regarding these entities is classified under ESEAL Directive █████████.

Awaiting Reports...

Incident Report: Anomalous Mutations

Overview:

As of ████/██/██, there have been documented 15 distinct mutations within the compromised facility. These mutations are not foreign entities, but the horrific result of the facility's own personnel being twisted and deformed by the catastrophic event. Each mutation exhibits unique behavioral patterns and physical characteristics, reflecting the specific roles and environments the personnel were exposed to before their transformation. The rate of mutation is accelerating, with new forms emerging at an alarming pace. Immediate execution and analysis are required to prevent further escalation.

Incident Report: Facility Status - Loss Confirmed

Overview:

A message as been sent by site personnel that the facility is confirmed lost. All containment efforts by on site security personnel have failed, and the mutations have overwhelmed every sector. The situation has deteriorated beyond any hope of recovery, with the facility now completely overrun by the transformed personnel.

All publicly known forces have been officially withdrawn, and all their operations are now focused on quarantine and containment of the surrounding area. No further attempts to reclaim the facility are authorized by said forces. The facility is now classified as a no-go zone. Complete loss has been acknowledged, and the site is to be considered a permanent hazard. Any surviving personnel within the facility are to be deemed compromised and are not to be approached under any circumstances. All records pertaining to the incident are classified under ESEAL Directive █████████ and are to be sealed until further notice.

The ESEAL force will be deployed to recover any remaining data and conduct a reconnaissance mission within the compromised facility. Their primary objective is to gather critical intelligence while assessing the extent of the infestation. All efforts will be made to ensure the operation remains covert and efficient, minimizing further exposure and knowledge of the anomaly. All knowledge of this mission is strictly on a "need-to-know" basis. Any unauthorized disclosure of information will trigger an immediate investigation and will be met with severe punishments.

We are currently awaiting the arrival of additional reports, which are expected to provide crucial updates on the situation. Some preliminary reports written by on site personnel have already been received but remain classified due to the sensitive nature of their contents. More information will be shared at a later date as it becomes available.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has the player make moral choices that many will find uncomfortable.

short_description: In ESEAL: Reject, Reclaim, Redeem join an elite team sent into a compromised facility to erase a catastrophic mistake. Battle nightmarish horrors, follow ruthless orders and uncover dark secrets. Will you obey your superiors or defy them? Survival and morality collide in this tense co-op FPS.
